cards.name: Devolution Spray
text: Devolve 1 of your evolved Pokémon and put the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your hand. (That Pokémon can't evolve this turn.)

cards.name: Energy Retrieval
text: Put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Full Heal
text: Remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Maintenance
text: Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your deck. (If you can't shuffle 2 cards into your deck, you can't play this card.) Then, draw a card.

cards.name: Mewtwo-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Energy Absorption
attacks.text: Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Pidgeot-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Mirror Move
attacks.text: If this Pokémon was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount of damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Feather Lance
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.name: M Pidgeot-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Mach Cyclone
attacks.text: You may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Brock's Grit
text: Shuffle 6 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Misty's Determination
text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, look at the top 8 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
